verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7802>Shushaneduth,<s%> <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> to <S%H3925>teach;<s%> when he <S%H5327>strove<s%> with <S%H763>Aramnaharaim<s%> and with <S%H760>Aramzobah,<s%> when <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> you have <S%H2186>cast<s%> us off, you have <S%H6555>scattered<s%> us, you have been <S%H599>displeased;<s%> O <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourself to us <S%H7725>again.<s%>
You have made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7493>tremble;<s%> you have <S%H6480>broken<s%> it: <S%H7495>heal<s%> the <S%H7667>breaches<s%> thereof; for it <S%H4131>shakes.<s%>
You have showed your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7186>hard<s%> things: you have made us to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H8653>astonishment.<s%>
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> to them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> you, that it may be <S%H5127>displayed<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7189>truth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
That your <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered;<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> with your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H6030>hear<s%> me.

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness;<s%> I will <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H4058>mete<s%> out the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is mine, and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> is mine; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>lawgiver;<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is my wash <S%H5518>pot;<s%> <S%H7366><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I <S%H7993>cast<s%> out my <S%H5275>shoe:<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> <S%H7321>triumph<s%> you <S%H5921>because<s%> of me.
<S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H123>Edom?<s%>
Will not you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> which had <S%H2186>cast<s%> us off? and you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> which did not <S%H3318>go<s%> out with our <S%H6635>armies?<s%>
<S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> from <S%H6862>trouble:<s%> for <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly:<s%> for he it is that shall <S%H947>tread<s%> down our <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>
